page.title: 01TOURISM
page.content: Hexham is a nice place there is an Abbey in Hexham the Abbey is about 1300 years old.There is a spiral staircase up to the bells.If you are not scared of being up high or loud noises you are sometimes allowed to ring the bells and go to the very top of the Abbey.The Abbey is the main attraction of Hexham.Outside the Sele First School there is a playground.In the playground there are two slides there are twelve swings three men and a climbing frame there are some logs to play on.There is a tennis court as well.Next to the tennis court there is a hill called the sele.The Tyne Green is a place that is beside the River Tyne.You can hire canoes.There is a boat house that you can hire boats from.
